com.domain.project.core.graph

Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.domain.project.core.graph.Base
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camp, City

    public class Base
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the image and game logic for a corresponding node
